body:
Dear List,


I still do not understand how to call the .cal files... I was trying to
calculate a View matrix using the following command:


*cat ./Workplanes/Floor.pts | rcontrib -n 1  -f klems_int.cal -b kbin(0, 1,
0, 0, 0, 1) -bn Nkbins -m window_1 -I+ V_model.oct > ./VMX/V-Room-1.vmx*
*
*
The problem is in the *kbin(0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1)* part, which I do not know
how to call (this is a window looking south).


I know I could call it like kbinS; but since I am exporting from SketchUp,
the normals and Ups may vary.


THANKS VERY MUCH


German
___
